overview:
mSpy is a stealth cell phone spy software that silently monitors any Apple iPhone, BlackBerry, Android, Windows Mobile, or Symbian OS based cell phone. This covert spy phone app offers a variety of advanced cell phone control features and an easy-to-use online account.

mSpy will store all call logs, text messages, eMails, photos, videos, surrounding conversations on demand and more on the online account, even if the owner of the spied phone immediately deletes the information from his phone. This cell spy tracks GPS and shows the monitored phoneâ€™s (1) current whereabouts on a convenient map in a private Control Panel; (2) OR a detailed route history in a specified period of time.

mSpy provides timely messages so that everyone can keep track of the activities of employees, family, or elderly people, thus keeping them secure, making informed decisions, and providing help if needed, or just for backup own cell phone activities.
